description: M e k ̣ o r   h ̣ a y i m   ( R i t u a l   t r e a t i s e   o n   s h e ḥ i ṭ a h   a n d   b e d i k ̣ a h ,   b a s e d   o n   Y a h ̣ y a ̄   b e n   J o s e p h   S a ̄ l i h ̣ ' s   w o r k s   Z e v a h ̣   t o d a h   a n d   S h a ʻ a r e   k ̣ e d u s h a h )
title: Meḳor ḥayim (Ritual treatise on sheḥiṭah and bediḳah, based on Yaḥyā ben Joseph Sāliḥ's works Zevaḥ todah and Shaʻare ḳedushah)
author: Yaḥyā ben Jacob Sāliḥ
